fullText:
"The production is technically impressive in all respects...Although in truth the show itself was already soporific enough."

Read more

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: Despite praising technical production values, the critic finds the show itself sleep-inducing ('soporific'), which is a damning assessment of the core theatrical experience. | GPT-4o-mini: The review highlights technical impressiveness but ultimately describes the show as boring, leading to a clear recommendation against seeing it.
